title: The Life and times of Rosie the riveter
creator_credit: Connie Field and Clarity Educational Productions
brief_description: Chronicles the brief career and sudden eclipse of Rosie the Riveter - symbol of millions of women who worked in the skilled industrial trades during World War Two. The story is told by five ‘Rosies’ who recall their working histories. This is interwoven with archival recruitment footage, stills, posters, ads and music from the period.
